name: VEGAS Movie Studio 13 Platinum - Steam Powered
name_original: VEGAS Movie Studio 13 Platinum - Steam Powered
description:
Create highly individual videos with VEGAS Movie Studio 13 Platinum – Steam Powered. Import videos from your smartphone and add finesse, effects, a soundtrack, titles and much more. Make your video unique.Two different editing modes:
Simple Edit Mode
Start your video in Simple Edit Mode; a great place to make basic edits and quickly finish your movie. Add titles, music, and video effects before uploading your completed masterpiece to the web. Simple Edit Mode offers all the tools and features you’ll need to put your movie together, fast.
 
Expanded edit mode
Switch to Advanced Edit Mode to create Hollywood-style projects with multiple layers and effects. Edit 4K, stereoscopic 3D, and AVCHD files right on the timeline. Use compositing and color-correction tools to add a more polished look.
 All functions
Video editing
  • Editing with touch
    The editing screen in Movie Studio 13 Platinum – Steam Powered is optimized for touch operation. Create a movie on your tablet PC simply using your fingers.
     
  • Color match
    Use the Color Match plug-in to make two different scenes appear as though they were shot on the same day, at the same time, and with the same filter.
     
  • Image stabilization
    Correct shaky videos and distorted recording using image stabilization directly in Movie Studio 13 Platinum – Steam Powered.
     
  • Format Support
    What do 4K, stereoscopic 3D, MP4, and AVCHD footage have in common? They can all be edited in the same Movie Studio project – XAVC S-support included!

Audio tools
     
  • zplane élastique timestretching
    Perform dramatic time stretches and pitch-shifts while retaining maximum sound quality.
     
  • Restore audio files
    The Audio Restoration plug-in lets you remove clicks, pops, and other unwanted noise from your music and audio files.
     
  • Surround sound mixing and encoding
    Use the surround sound mixing and panning tools to create surround soundtracks for your DVD and Blu-ray Disc creations.
Additional highlightsSoundtracks and titles
 
Round out your movie with exciting soundtracks and beautiful titles. Create the perfect music bed by importing your own music from CD or MP3, or recording instruments directly into the program.
 
Add animated or simple, yet classic-looking, text with the titling tools. Make your video cut through the clutter.
